Hurricane Isaac makes landfall in La.

The U.S. National Hurricane Center said the storm’s center reached land at 6:45 tonight about 90 miles southeast of New Orleans. (AP)

SJC: Adoptees do not have same rights to family fortunes in pre-1958 wills

The state's highest court ruled in a closely-watched case that adoptees don't have the same standing as biological children in wills written before 1958. (Boston Globe)

Politics

Ex-US Sen. Specter says he has cancer again

The 82-year-old Specter called his latest diagnosis "another battle I intend to win." He has survived two bouts of Hodgkin's disease, a cancer of the lymphatic system. (AP)
